response.overview: A married woman (Naomie Stark) is aggressively seduced by her husband’s alpha-male coworker (Tyler Drake). A confident Tyler finds it impossible to control his aggressiveness, which shows in his awkward attempt to show his affection. Oddly, Naomie quickly accepts a subservient role and begins to enjoy the rough stuff. While Naomie’s husband is away on business, Tyler makes sure to Mark is Territory by emptying his balls all over different parts of Naomie’s body…
response.title: Marked Territory
